content.json:
## Application Gateway WAF triage workbook
---

This workbook will help you triage Application Gateway WAF violations.

parameters.name: workspace
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize by id, name
| project id

content.title: Select the scope of the WAF policy

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs 
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and PolicyScopeName == '{PolicyScope}'
| summarize Count = count() by RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, FileDetails, LineDetails, Action
| order by Count desc
| project-reorder Count
//| extend ruleidentif = RuleId
//| extend ruleSetVersionss = RuleSetVersion, ruleSetTypess = RuleSetType
| extend normalizedRuleSetVersion = case(isempty(RuleSetVersion), "",
                                         // old engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.1.0" while type is "OWASP_CRS" => leave untouched, can use this as-is
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.1.0/rules/REQUEST-913-SCANNER-DETECTION.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+", RuleSetVersion,
                                         // new engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.2" while type is "OWASP CRS" => need a version that looks like "3.2.0"
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.2.0/rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+", strcat(RuleSetVersion, ".0"),
                                         "")
| extend normalizedDetailsFile = case(  RuleSetType == "OWASP_CRS", replace(@'rules/', '', FileDetails),   // old engine: details_files_s looks like "rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP_CRS"
                                        RuleSetType == "OWASP CRS", FileDetails,                           // new engine: details_files_s looks like "REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP CRS"
                                        FileDetails)
| extend Url = iif(isnotempty(RuleSetVersion), strcat('https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/', 'v', normalizedRuleSetVersion, '/rules/', normalizedDetailsFile, '#L', LineDetails), '')
// add sparklines
| join kind=inner (AGCFirewallLogs // |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog" | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and PolicyScopeName == '{PolicyScope}'
                                    | make-series Trend = count() on TimeGenerated from {detectionTime:start} to {detectionTime:end} step (time({detectionTime:seconds} seconds) / 20)  by RuleId
    ) on RuleId
| extend Id = new_guid()
content.title: Rules that got triggered

formatOptions.linkLabel: Go to Core Rule Set Project GitHub for this rule

content.title: Hosts Affected

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and PolicyScopeName == '{PolicyScope}' and RuleId == '{RuleId}'
| where hostname_s == '{HostName}'
| project-reorder hostname_s, transactionId_g
| join kind=inner (AGCFirewallLogs | where Category == "ApplicationGatewayAccessLog" | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}) on transactionId_g
| distinct host_s1, httpMethod_s1, requestUri_s1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s1
| order by host_s1, requestUri_s1, httpMethod_s1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s1
| extend id = new_guid()
content.title: Hosts and urls impacted by selected rule
Requests on selected host and url

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs 
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| where transactionId_g == '{TransactionId}'
| extend Id = new_guid()
| project-reorder Id, Action, RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Message, hostname_s, requestUri_s, details_message_s, details_data_s, FileDetails, LineDetails, transactionId_g
| extend normalizedRuleSetVersion = case(isempty(RuleSetVersion), "",
                                         // old engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.1.0" while type is "OWASP_CRS" => leave untouched, can use this as-is
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.1.0/rules/REQUEST-913-SCANNER-DETECTION.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+", RuleSetVersion,
                                         // new engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.2" while type is "OWASP CRS" => need a version that looks like "3.2.0"
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.2.0/rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+", strcat(RuleSetVersion, ".0"),
                                         "")
| extend normalizedDetailsFile = case(  RuleSetType == "OWASP_CRS", replace(@'rules/', '', FileDetails),   // old engine: details_files_s looks like "rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP_CRS"
                                        RuleSetType == "OWASP CRS", FileDetails,                           // new engine: details_files_s looks like "REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP CRS"
                                        FileDetails)
| extend Url = iif(isnotempty(RuleSetVersion), strcat('https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/', 'v', normalizedRuleSetVersion, '/rules/', normalizedDetailsFile, '#L', LineDetails), '')
| project Action, RuleId, Message, details_message_s, details_data_s, Url, TimeGenerated
content.title: Rules that got triggered for selected request

formatOptions.linkLabel: Go to Core Rule Set Project GitHub for this rule

content.title: Hostnames with entries in Firewall Log

items.name: Hostnames with entries in Firewall Log

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and PolicyScopeName == '{PolicyScope}'
| where hostname_s == '{HostName}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| join kind=inner (AGCFirewallLogs | where Category == "ApplicationGatewayAccessLog" | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}')
  on transactionId_g
| distinct  requestUri_s, httpMethod_s1, originalRequestUriWithArgs_s1, httpStatus_d1
| extend Id = new_guid()
content.title: Paths which have triggered firewall rules

items.name: Paths which have triggered firewall rules

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
| where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}' and PolicyScopeName == '{PolicyScope}'
| where hostname_s == '{HostName}'
| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| join kind=inner (AGCFirewallLogs | where Category == "ApplicationGatewayAccessLog" | where _ResourceId == '{ResourceId}')
  on transactionId_g
| where originalRequestUriWithArgs_s1 == ```{RequestUriWithArgs}``` and httpMethod_s1 == '{HttpMethod}' and httpStatus_d1 == '{HttpStatus}'
| distinct transactionId_g
| extend access_log = strcat("AGCFirewallLogs | where Category == \"ApplicationGatewayAccessLog\" | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where transactionId_g == \"", transactionId_g, "\"")
| extend firewall_log = strcat("AGCFirewallLogs | where Category == \"ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog\" | where TimeGenerated {detectionTime} | where transactionId_g == \"", transactionId_g, "\"")
content.title: Requests on selected host and url

content.query:
AGCFirewallLogs 
// |where Category == "ApplicationGatewayFirewallLog"
//| where TimeGenerated {detectionTime}
| where transactionId_g == '{TransactionId}'
| extend Id = new_guid()
| project-reorder Id, Action, RuleSetType, RuleSetVersion, RuleId, Message, hostname_s, requestUri_s, details_message_s, details_data_s, FileDetails, LineDetails, transactionId_g
| extend normalizedRuleSetVersion = case(isempty(RuleSetVersion), "",
                                         // old engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.1.0" while type is "OWASP_CRS" => leave untouched, can use this as-is
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.1.0/rules/REQUEST-913-SCANNER-DETECTION.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+.[0-9]+", RuleSetVersion,
                                         // new engine: RuleSetVersion looks like "3.2" while type is "OWASP CRS" => need a version that looks like "3.2.0"
                                         //             final url to GH is like: https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/v3.2.0/rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf#L56
                                         RuleSetVersion matches regex "[0-9]+.[0-9]+", strcat(RuleSetVersion, ".0"),
                                         "")
| extend normalizedDetailsFile = case(  RuleSetType == "OWASP_CRS", replace(@'rules/', '', FileDetails),   // old engine: details_files_s looks like "rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP_CRS"
                                        RuleSetType == "OWASP CRS", FileDetails,                           // new engine: details_files_s looks like "REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf" while type is "OWASP CRS"
                                        FileDetails)
| extend Url = iif(isnotempty(RuleSetVersion), strcat('https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/blob/', 'v', normalizedRuleSetVersion, '/rules/', normalizedDetailsFile, '#L', LineDetails), '')
| project Action, RuleId, Message, details_message_s, details_data_s, Url, TimeGenerated, RuleSetType, normalizedRuleSetVersion
content.title: Rules that got triggered for selected request
